General.Name: AEON Stores (Hong Kong) Co. Limited
General.Description: AEON Stores (Hong Kong) Co., Limited operates general merchandise stores. The company offers a range of daily use products, such as food, fashion products, household items, and electrical appliances; kitchen utensils, stationery, glassware, home decoration, beauty and personal care products, and other products; food and beverages; bread, pastries, and other food delicacies; cosmetics, skin care, and personal care products, as well as drugs and healthy food products; inner and causal wear; and amusement rides. It also operates coffee shops; and AEONCITY, an online shopping store. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong. AEON Stores (Hong Kong) Co., Limited is a subsidiary of AEON Co., Ltd.
General.Address: CDW Building, Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong
